html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-00562025-01-31FIN
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Minister of Finance to Provide Financial Assistance to the Canada Post Corporation for the period beginning April 1, 2025 and ending on March 31, 2026
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO THE CANADA POST CORPORATION for the period beginning April 1, 2025 and ending on March 31, 2026, to a maximum of $1.034 billion in order to enable it to meet all its operating and income charges during this period.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO THE CANADA POST CORPORATION for the period beginning April 1, 2025 and ending on March 31, 2026, to a maximum of $1.034 billion in order to enable it to meet all its operating and income charges during this period.
